name: MyCash Online (SG) Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a financial services marketplace intended to provide a wide range of money transfer financial services for migrant workers. The company's marketplace helps migrant foreign workers who do not have the access to online banking or credit cards to services like online bus ticket booking, air ticket, bill payment and mobile top-up, enabling migrant workers to have access to a variety of digital payments services and customize them according to their needs.
